translations: vt.使……穿上长袍（或礼服）（gown 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: They held themselves at a slight remove from other men, gowned in spotless white.
sentences.translation: 他们穿着一尘不染的白色长袍，与其他男人保持着轻微的距离。

sentences.sentence: Kong was the only long-gowned customer to drink his wine standing.
sentences.translation: 孔乙己是站着喝酒而穿长衫的唯一的人。

sentences.sentence: Kong Yiji was the only long-gowned drinker who took his wine standing up.
sentences.translation: 孔乙己是站着喝酒而穿长衫的唯一的人。
